item.description:
Place: E.Brimfield Lake Aprox 3 miles WEST out of sturbridge. we will Launch from the South Boat Ramp which is a bout 1/4 Mile West of the usual launch but on the opposite side(South) of Rte 20. There is no sign but the entrance is very visible and is right across from a little garden stand.

Please arrive so that we can depart at 10:00AM. We'll figure out out route beased on group interest and plan on being on the water 3 hours. As always FUN is first!

Do remember the water is still quite cold so dress accordingly and have spare warm layers in a dri bag just in case. PFD mandatory!
item.name: Last Minute Patriots Day Padle-E. Brimfield Lake... Monday 4/19/10 @10AM
